chara.textHome: I'm no longer some weakling.@With this lantern, I will absorb@every ounce of your magic.
I'm no longer some weakling.@With this lantern, I will absorb@every ounce of your magic.
It might even suck out@your very soul, you know…@*Giggle*
It might even suck out@your very soul, you know…@*Giggle*
No need to be scared.@If the end comes for us all,@the WHEN doesn't matter, right?
No need to be scared.@If the end comes for us all,@the WHEN doesn't matter, right?
I've been dyed with grief.@I just want everything to end.
I've been dyed with grief.@I just want everything to end.
That's all…
For some reason...thinking about@Mii makes me so sad sometimes.
She means more to me than@anything in the world, and yet...
She means more to me than@anything in the world, and yet...
Why do I feel this@gap between us?
I selfishly cursed people and@wished misfortune upon them.
But Mii sought after my@happiness, and used her only@wish to make it come true.
We may be sisters,@but we are nothing alike...
We may be sisters,@but we are nothing alike...
If ruin is inescapable, I will@herald it with my own hands.
If ruin is inescapable, I will@herald it with my own hands.
I can destroy everything@by fighting this way.
I'll leave nothing behind:@the city, the memories,@nothing will remain!
I'll leave nothing behind:@the city, the memories,@nothing will remain!
At first I became stronger@so I could protect my shop…@My only place in the world.
But now… My hands hold@the power to bring about@inevitable destruction.
But now… My hands hold@the power to bring about@inevitable destruction.
The more I resist my wish@for destruction, the larger@in scale the effects grow.
In that case, I have@no choice but to accept it!
I'll reap destruction before@my wish balloons even further.
I'll risk everything I have@to make that happen.
My, my, you came@to see me again?
But alas, the Coordinator's@Shop has been closed.
Unless...you came@here to kill me?
Long ago, I was to be envied,@wearing a Mizuna Girls' School@uniform despite my Daito roots.
I used to believe the days of@the East being looked down@upon by others would end.
I used to believe the days of@the East being looked down@upon by others would end.
Before I transferred to Mizuna,@I admired their field trip lunches.
They always seemed rather@special and luxurious to me.
I just remembered@that all of a sudden.
Oh, don't you recognize me?@It's Mitama Yakumo.
Oh, don't you recognize me?@It's Mitama Yakumo.
My appearance has altered,@but I'm still the same as ever.@I'm incapable of change…
My appearance has altered,@but I'm still the same as ever.@I'm incapable of change…
This was my busiest time of day.@All kinds of girls would visit me.
This was my busiest time of day.@All kinds of girls would visit me.
This was my busiest time of day.@All kinds of girls would visit me.
Is that really on my mind?@I thought I'd cut myself away@from it all. What a fool I am…
Is that really on my mind?@I thought I'd cut myself away@from it all. What a fool I am…
*Sob* …The darkness of night@fills me with sorrow…
But why…? Why are all of@these heartfelt memories@flooding back to me…?!
And for what reason…@do I feel such grief now?
What? If you want to tell@me something, feel free.
However, no matter what@you may say, your words@will never stir my heart.
However, no matter what@you may say, your words@will never stir my heart.
Since I'm going to destroy@everything, it might be better@to give in and become a Witch.
Since I'm going to destroy@everything, it might be better@to give in and become a Witch.
At least that way, even@a person like me could turn@into food for someone else...
At least that way, even@a person like me could turn@into food for someone else…
Mikoto Sena… Word has it that@she heard my wish right before@she turned into a Witch.
Which means she's aware@of my hatred for this city…
I was consumed by rage and@sorrow when I made my wish.
Had it not been for my desire@to take revenge on Kamihama,@I wouldn't be alive here today.
Had it not been for my desire@to take revenge on Kamihama,@I wouldn't be alive here today.
Where do you think@I went wrong?
Going to Mizuna Girls' School?@Returning to Daito?@Becoming a Magical Girl?
Going to Mizuna Girls' School?@Returning to Daito?@Becoming a Magical Girl?
Or perhaps...@My existence as a whole?
Or perhaps...@My existence as a whole?
When I got expelled from Mizuna@Girls' School, the people of the East@didn't bother to figure out why.
They just wanted to vent@their frustrations and pelted@me with hateful words.
The grief of being betrayed@bred hatred in me.
These emotions are now part@of my heart. They're necessary@to make me who I am…
These emotions are now part@of my heart. They're necessary@to make me who I am…
Spending time with all@the other Magical Girls was@like an afternoon nap.
Wrapped in soft cloth,@with whispers that I'm@going to be alright…
Wrapped in soft cloth,@with whispers that I'm@going to be alright…
I wish I could experience@those days again.
How will everyone react when@they learn they're going to die@from the grief they caused?
If they were to apologize…@What would they need to say@to make me forgive them?
If they were to apologize…@What would they need to say@to make me forgive them?
Had I been in the same@class as Tsukuyo and Ria and@become friends with them,
maybe I would've enjoyed@my time at Mizuna Girls' School.
maybe I would've enjoyed@my time at Mizuna Girls' School.
If the future that Kanagi wants@ever comes to pass, I wonder if@Mii will be able to live happily?
If the future that Kanagi wants@ever comes to pass, I wonder if@Mii will be able to live happily?
If the future that Kanagi wants@ever comes to pass, I wonder if@Mii will be able to live happily?
Surrounded by loyal friends,@without the discrimination of@being from the East… *Giggle*
Surrounded by loyal friends,@without the discrimination of@being from the East… *Giggle*
Surrounded by loyal friends,@without the discrimination of@being from the East… *Giggle*
"You've always have@a smile on your face!",@"Aren't you happy today?"
…I was only keeping@up appearances.
Isn't it better to seem cheery@rather than grumpy so you@won't get attacked? *Giggle*
Isn't it better to seem cheery@rather than grumpy so you@won't get attacked? *Giggle*
I wonder, can you@shatter my wish?
It seems there's no one@left standing anymore.
There is no outrunning@my wish for destruction…
There is no outrunning@my wish for destruction…
Farewell.
My power has grown stronger.@Or maybe...my grief has instead.
My power has grown stronger.@Or maybe...my grief has instead.
I am inseparable from ruin.@Past the point of no return…
I am inseparable from ruin.@Past the point of no return…
I don't know if I have@any pleasant memories.
…Surely there must@be something, right?
…Surely there must@be something, right?
It's amazing how much@Mii looks like I did back@in elementary school...
It's amazing how much@Mii looks like I did back@in elementary school...
In both looks and@personality, she's just...
I can only hope@she stays that way.
